images.desc: The beginning of the tunnel to Smith Hall
The fork in the tunnel to Smith Hall. Continue on the left to the sub-basement of Smith Hall. Take the right path with the stairs to the basement of Smith Hall.

instructions: Descend to floor 1, which is below the mall level.
The north side of Kolthoff Hall has a tunnel. Enter it.
Enter the basement of Smith Hall on the right or the sub-basement on the left.
